column4: hey all, can someone help me activate desktop enhancements on my new Ubuntu install?
doesn't work... get a msg says "unable to start desktop enhancements"
I have AGP slot with Pent4 2.4GHZ CPU, 2GB RAM.. recommend a graphics card?
i think ubuntu likes ati, maybe one of them?
should recognize and do the housekeeping automatically
should I be able to get desktop enhancements with the onboard graphics?
when I try I get "unable" diaglog
yeah, we had this discussion either last night or the night before
maybe, but I still haven't been able to get it to work
mm, as i said, you need a gfx card
so you shut down, install card, attach monitor to vga port on card and Ubuntu will do the rest?
